extends Object

Method Detail

connect

public boolean connect()
Connects to the MX database.

Specified by:
connect in interface IDeploymentAdapter
Returns:
true if already connected or connect to MX database was successfully; otherwise false is returned
See Also:
connected, mxContext, checkVersions()

checkVersions

protected void checkVersions()
Checks that the version of the MxUpdate Eclipse Plug-In and the version of the MxUpdate Update Deployment Tool have the same major and minor number within their versions. If not equal the plug-in automatically disconnects from MX.

See Also:
disconnect(), getPlugInVersion(), connect()

getPlugInVersion

protected String getPlugInVersion()
                           throws IOException
Returns for this plug-in the version stored within manifest file.

Returns:
found plug-in version within manifest file
Throws:
IOException - if the manifest file could not found or not opened
See Also:
MANIFEST_FILE

disconnect

public boolean disconnect()
Disconnect from the MX database.

Specified by:
disconnect in interface IDeploymentAdapter
Returns:
true if already disconnected or disconnect from MX database was successfully; otherwise false is returned
See Also:
connected, mxContext

update

public void update(List<org.eclipse.core.resources.IFile> _files,
                   boolean _compile)
Updates given MX update files in the MX database. If PREF_UPDATE_FILE_CONTENT is set, also the file content is transfered within the update (e.g. if an update on another server is done).

Specified by:
update in interface IDeploymentAdapter
Parameters:
_files - MxUpdate file which must be updated
_compile - if true all JPOs are compiled; if false no JPOs are compiled, only an update is done
See Also:
#execMql(CharSequence)

extractCode

public String extractCode(org.eclipse.core.resources.IFile _file)
                   throws matrix.util.MatrixException
Extract the TCL update code for given _file from MX.

Specified by:
extractCode in interface IDeploymentAdapter
Parameters:
_file - name of the update file for which the TCL update code within MX must be extracted
Returns:
configuration item update code for given _file
Throws:
matrix.util.MatrixException - if update code could not be extracted

execute

public String execute(CharSequence _command)
               throws matrix.util.MatrixException
Executes given MQL command and returns the trimmed result of the MQL execution. The MX context mxContext is connected to the data base if not already done.

Specified by:
execute in interface IDeploymentAdapter
Parameters:
_command - MQL command to execute
Returns:
trimmed result of the MQL execution
Throws:
matrix.util.MatrixException - if MQL execution fails
See Also:
mxContext, connect()

jpoInvoke

protected String jpoInvoke(String _jpo,
                           String _method,
                           Object... _parameters)
                    throws IOException,
                           matrix.util.MatrixException
Calls given _method in _jpo. The MX context mxContext is connected to the database if not already done.

Parameters:
_jpo - name of JPO to call
_method - method of the called _jpo
_parameters - list of all parameters for the _jpo which are automatically encoded encoded
Returns:
returned value from the called _jpo
Throws:
IOException - if the parameter could not be encoded
matrix.util.MatrixException - if the called _jpo throws an exception
See Also:
mxContext, connect()
